synopsis.text: They started as aspiring mangaka in middle school, and now Moritaka Mashiro and Akito Takagi, known by their pen name Muto Ashirogi, are closer than ever to their dream of seeing one of their mangas adapted into an anime. But the journey is far from over, as they face new challenges and rivals in their quest to climb the Shounen Jack rankings. With the threat of cancellation looming if they can't compete with the artist Eiji Niizuma within six months, Muto Ashirogi must push themselves to new heights, all while navigating new friendships and rivalries in Bakuman's 3rd Season. The race to the top is on, and these young artists are determined to make their mark on the manga world.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
